ComicInfo.Summary:
From the creators of Gears of War and Kurtis Wiebe, the writer of the hit Rise of RAAM miniseries, comes a pulse-pounding new mission with a whole new squad—Team Scorpio! After successfully busting a Swarm hive on the remote island of Pahanu, this suicide squad will face their most dangerous mission yet—going after the Swarm that decimated the home settlement of one of their own!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Alan Quah (a) & Sean Lee (c) | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Pierre Droal | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 19:22:03. [CVDB707918]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alan Quah, Pierre Droal, Sean Lee
ComicInfo.Editor: Anni Perheentupa, Chase Marotz, Denton J. Tipton
